background.script:
on unitSelectedPropertyChange if unitSelected of the target is true then set the lineWidth of the target to 2 else set the lineWidth of the target to 0 end if end unitSelectedPropertyChange
on mouseDown buttonNumber,firstModifier if the target has property unitSelected then if firstModifier is not shift then repeat with x = 1 to number of card buttons if card button x has property unitSelected then set the unitSelected of card button x to false end if end repeat set the unitSelected of the target to true else set the unitSelected of the target to (not the unitSelected of the target) end if else show bg grc "selectionRectangle" repeat with x = 1 to number of card buttons if cd btn x has property unitSelected then set the unitSelected of card button x to false end if end repeat set rectangle of bg grc "selectionRectangle" to "left:" & horizontal of the mouseLoc & return & "top:" & vertical of the mouseLoc &return& "right:" & horizontal of the mouseLoc &return& "bottom:" & vertical of the mouseLoc end if end mouseDown
on mouseDrag set rectangle of bg grc "selectionRectangle" to "left:" & left of the rectangle of bg grc "selectionRectangle" & return & "top:" & top of the rectangle of bg grc "selectionRectangle" &return& "right:" & horizontal of the mouseLoc &return& "bottom:" & vertical of the mouseLoc end mouseDrag
on mouseUp if the visible of bg grc "selectionRectangle" is true then repeat with x = 1 to number of card buttons if cd btn x has property unitSelected then if the rectangle of cd btn x intersects the rectangle of bg grc "selectionRectangle" then set the unitSelected of card button x to true end if end if end repeat hide bg grc "selectionRectangle" end if end mouseUp
on mouseUpOutside hide bg grc "selectionRectangle" end mouseUpOutside
